title: Effect of DDT on Fish-Eating Birds

content.question: A scientist wants to study the effect of <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in a fish-eating bird species. She measures a variety of variables in a population of birds over a period of ten years to determine how levels of <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> affect bird survival and reproduction. Which of the following identifies a scientific question she could ask to best evaluate the effect of <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> on the bird species?

choices.label: Is the bird species able to metabolize <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> faster than the fish the birds consume?

Does the persistence of <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> lead to eggshell thinning or developmental deformities in the bird species?

Has the decrease in <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> usage led to a decrease in <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration in the tissues of fish-eating birds?

How long does it take for <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to break down once it is absorbed in the fatty tissues of the fish-eating birds?

content.answer: Does the persistence of <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DDT</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> lead to eggshell thinning or developmental deformities in the bird species?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify a testable hypothesis or scientific question for an investigation.
